src:
Manusia Bionik Akan Ramaikan Pameran Disrupto 2019
06 Nov 2019, 16:05 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Foto: Adi Fida Rahman/detikINET

Jakarta - Sukses dihelat tahun lalu, gelaran Disrupto kembali lagi tahun ini. Banyak hal menarik akan dihadirkan, salah satunya kehadiran manusia bionik.Project Director Disrupto 2019 Yasha Chatab mengatakan tahun lalu pihaknya lebih menitik beratkan pada startup, investor dan blockchain. Tahun ini berbeda, lebih mengeksplorasi tantangan yang akan dihadapi manusia di masa yang akan datang. Karena itu tema yang diambil adalah The Future Humanity."Kami ingin membuat ekosistem. Dengan adanya teknologi, inovasi dan disrupsi jadi satu, supaya ide dan solusinya datang. Karena ide dan solusi bisa datang dari mana saja," kaya Yasha saat berbincang usai konferensi pers di GoWork Plaza Indonesia, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).Salah satu topik utama yang akan dihadirkan mengenai kecerdasan buatan atau AI. Diharapkan lewat Disrupto, membuka pandangan masyarakat Indonesia bagaimana perkembangan AI telah banyak digunakan di luar sana.


Foto: Adi Fida Rahman/detikINET

"AI adalah masa depan, sudah seperti ini lho di luar, kita ingin perlihatkan. Terkadang kan kita cuma baca-baca, liat di YouTube atau apa, menarik ya tapi tidak ketemu langsung. Nah di Disrupto akan bisa bertemu langsung," ujar Yasha.Pembicara yang akan dihadirkan guna membahas AI adalah Cyberdyne. Merupakan perusahaan asal Jepang yang membuat robot untuk membantu kaum lansia dan difabel dalam mobilitas. Selain itu ada Tilly Lockey, dia adalah seorang difabel yang terbantu aktivitasnya berkat adanya inovasi teknologi."Tilly waktu bayi tangannya kena penyakit yang mengharuskan diamputasi. Tapi sekarang ini dia menggunakan tangan robot dari Open Bionic. Menjadikan Tilly seperti manusia super," jelas Yasha. Nama-nama lain yang siap menyemarakkan Disrupto 2019 meliputi Furhat Robotics (robot sosial yang bisa berkomunikasi dan menunjukkan emosi layaknya manusa), Liam Nikuro (influencer virtual) dan lain-lain. Ada pula pembicara global yang merupakan pakar di bidangnya dan akan memamerkan beberapa inovasi teknologi. Disrupto 2019 akan dihelat pada 22-24 November 2019 mendatang. Acara akan digelar di Plaza Indonesia. Simak Video "Ini Nih Rahasia Kamera Ponsel Bisa Serasa Kamera DSLR!"[Gambas:Video 20detik](afr/fay)
text:
Bionic Man Will Enliven the 2019 Disrupto Exhibition
Nov 6 2019, 16:05 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Photo: Adi Fida Rahman / detikINET

Jakarta - Success held last year, the Disrupto event returned this year. Many interesting things will be presented, one of them is the presence of a bionic human being. Project Director of Disrupto 2019 Yasha Chatab said that last year he focused more on startups, investors and blockchain. This year is different, exploring more challenges that humans will face in the future. Because of that the theme taken is The Future Humanity. "We want to create an ecosystem. With technology, innovation and disruption combined, so that ideas and solutions come. Because ideas and solutions can come from anywhere," Yasha said when speaking after the press conference. at GoWork Plaza Indonesia, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). One of the main topics that will be presented is about artificial intelligence or AI. It is hoped that through Disrupto, it will open up the views of Indonesian people how the development of AI has been widely used out there.


Photo: Adi Fida Rahman / detikINET

"AI is the future, it's like this outside, we want to show it. Sometimes we just read, look at YouTube or what, it's interesting but we don't meet it directly. Now in Disrupto we will be able to meet in person," said Yasha. The speaker who will be presented to discuss AI is Cyberdyne. Is a Japanese company that makes robots to help the elderly and disabled in mobility. In addition there is Tilly Lockey, he is a diffable who is helped by his activities thanks to technological innovations. "Tilly when the baby's hand had an illness that required amputation. But now he uses a robot hand from Open Bionic. Making Tilly like a superhuman," explained Yasha. Other names that are ready to enliven Disrupto 2019 include Furhat Robotics (social robots that can communicate and show emotions like humans), Liam Nikuro (virtual influencer) and others. There are also global speakers who are experts in their fields and will exhibit several technological innovations. Disrupto 2019 will be held on November 22-24, 2019. The event will be held at Plaza Indonesia. Check out the video "This is the Secret of a Mobile Camera Can Feel Like a DSLR Camera!" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (afr / fay)
